item.title: Saving game automatically?
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

How do I make it so it save’s the game automatically faster because it auto save’s like every 5 minutes and when I do a restart the player’s are reset like 5 minute’s back.I found this code but im not sure if this is it:

if (resetanim <= 0) {// resetAnimation();
// resetanim = 8;
}

    neadminather();

    appendPos();

    smitimer -= 1;
    if (smitimer <= 1) {
        savechar();
        println_debug("Auto saved game.");
        savemoreinfo();
        println_debug("Auto saving moreinfo file...");
        if (savemoreinfo()) {
            println_debug("Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.");
            attempts = 0;
            smitimer = 150;
        } else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5) {
            println_debug(
                    "Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds");
            println_debug("Attempts: " + attempts);
            attempts += 1;
            smitimer = 5;
        } else if (!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5) {
            println_debug(
                    "Attempts: " + attempts
                    + " - Giving up saving moreinfo file!");
            attempts += 1;
            smitimer = 99999999;
        }
    }

see the smittimer = 150 is that what I need to change and how does the time go like is 150 150 seconds?

Read full topic
